'crawler.archive.org' is the exact same site as 'archive-crawler.sourceforge.net',
so if you can access that, you should be fine.

'crawler.archive.org' has always worked for me, from various internet
connections, so I suspect a problem local to your site/ISP. You may
want to see what happens when you try the IP address directly, eg:

  http://66.35.250.210/

You won't get our site, but should get an error message from the
sourceforge server. If not, there's some network problem between
you and that IP having nothing specific to do with the Heritrix
site.

- Gordon @ IA
